channel.title: Hugo on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Upgrade to Hugo 0.20
item.description: I’ve upgraded this weblog to Hugo 0.20, which is available by Homebrew on the Mac and with a series of prebuilt binaries for many systems. Hugo in this 0.20 new release promises a lot of new features, including but not limited to support for rendering calendars. I’ll give it a try. One of my goals of Hugo is getting it to run on linux/arm64. It should be easy, since it’s written in Go, and golang ports are absurdly easy.
